value:
I think fondly of Fiana, the place
where Leif and I once lived. It was
my home, and I will never forget it.

Lord Lewyn said my mother is still
alive... I want to meet her. I want
her to see who I've become.

Retreat is not always an option, and
you must be prepared for that. Which
is why you should rest now and again.

What should I do next? Oh, no...sorry.
That's something it would be best for
me to figure out for myself.

I'd like to spend my days peacefully,
surrounded by loved ones. That's all
anybody really wants, I believe.

I've come to bring a gift of friendship
from $Nf.

I feel as if I'm full to bursting with
light! I will dedicate this power to the
well-being of people everywhere.

I've known war. You underestimate
me to your own detriment if you
can't see past my title as princess.
Th-this can't be...

Thank you. I will use this new power
to shine as a beacon of peace.

I am Nanna. Lachesis of House
Nordion is my mother. I am proud
to carry the power of Hoðr's blood.

When I was three years old, my
mother left, saying that she was
going to meet my brother Diarmuid.$k$pShe vanished in the Aed desert...$k$pLord Leif made me a promise.
He told me that after the war was
over, we'd search for my mother.$k$pI was so happy at the time, but...now
it feels like I was only thinking about
myself—and I took advantage of Leif.$k$pFor that, I feel ashamed.$k$pWar is known to create orphans.
I've felt their sorrow... So, I want
to help as many of them as I can.$k$pMy greatest wish is to create a place
for children who have been hurt—for
them to rest, to sleep without worry.
はっ
いきます
きゃあっ
これでは…
I wish to be of aid!
For the future!
I won't back down.
Allow me to assist!
Please forgive me...
Sigh...
I'm a Legendary Hero? Are you sure this is not some misunderstanding?
*gasp* Please don't startle people like that!
As a member of House Nordion, it is my duty to learn how to wield a sword.
When I feel my courage falter, I remember you are at my side. That makes even the fiercest battlefield bearable.
Mother... Please watch over me.
I wonder what Leif thinks of this outfit...
I must work even harder so that I can continue to be of use to you.
I understand.
Are you sure?
I will give it my all.
